scripts.build: ls -la && echo !=!=!=! &&  ls -la .. && export RUSTUP_HOME="/workspace/.rustup" && export CARGO_HOME="/workspace/.cargo" && export TMPDIR="/workspace/.rustup/tmp" && echo "RUSTUP_HOME: $RUSTUP_HOME" && echo "CARGO_HOME: $CARGO_HOME" && echo "TMPDIR: $TMPDIR" && mkdir -p "$TMPDIR" && curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y && export PATH="$CARGO_HOME/bin:$PATH" && echo "PATH: $PATH" && echo "Rust Version:" && rustc --version && echo "Cargo Version:" && cargo --version && npm install && wasm-pack build --release --target web  && echo "BUILD SUCCESS Oct1" && cp -r www/* pkg/ && cp index.html pkg/
scripts.testbuild: echo !=!=!=! && rustc --version && echo "Cargo Version:" && cargo --version && wasm-pack build --release --target web && echo "BUILD SUCCESS12"
scripts.start: echo STARTING && serve pkg && echo START COMPLETE
